page.title: 07EVENTS
page.content: EVENTS - VILLAGE FLOWER SHOW ----------------------------- ONCE A YEAR THE SWANTON ABBOTT AND SKEYTON W.I. MEMBERS AND THEIR FAMILIES ENTER FLOWER/VEG,COOKERY AND CRAFT SECTIONS WHICH ARE FURTHER DIVIDED FOR EASIER JUDGING.IN 1985 THE SHOW LASTED ALL DAY TO GIVE MEMBERS A CHANCE TO ARRANGE THEIR ENTRIES. JUDGES FROM LOCAL VILLAGES CAME TO DECIDE THE WINNERS AND THE VILLAGE HALL WAS THEN OPEN TO EVERYONE AND REFRESHMENTS SERVED.THE MARJORIE HILL TROPHY HAS BEEN GIVEN TO THIS W.I. FOR THE WINNERS OF THE THREE SECTIONS AND TO EACH CHILD ENTERING EXHIBITS. MOST ARE PLEASED WITH THIS EXHIBITION OF FLOWERS,VEG,NEEDLEWORK,ARTWORK AND CAKES ETC.IN THE VILLAGE HALL AND ARE KEEN TO KEEP THIS VILLAGE EVENT THRIVING.
